presentationColumns.name: Invoices on Hold Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoice amount and considers all invoice types that have either Header Level Hold, Line Level Hold, or a combination. This metrics considers only active holds that are without release details.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Holds.Invoices on Hold Amount

presentationColumns.name: Invoices on Hold Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoice count and considers all invoice types that have either Header Level Hold, Line Level Hold, or a combination. This metrics considers only active holds that are without release details.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Holds.Invoices on Hold Count

presentationColumns.name: Invoice Headers on Hold Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoice amount and considers all invoice types that have Header Level Hold. This metrics considers only active holds that are without release details.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Holds.Invoice Headers on Hold Amount

presentationColumns.name: Invoice Headers on Hold Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoice header count which has header level hold and considers all invoice types. This metrics considers only active holds which are without release details.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Holds.Invoice Headers on Hold Count

presentationColumns.name: Invoice Lines on Hold Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoice line amount which has line level hold and considers all invoice types. This metrics considers only active holds which are without release details.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Holds.Invoice Lines on Hold Amount

presentationColumns.name: Invoice Lines on Hold Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoice line count which has line level hold and considers all invoice types. This metrics considers only active holds which are without release details.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Holds.Invoice Lines on Hold Count

presentationColumns.name: Total Holds Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the total number of holds applied on invoice headers and lines. This metrics considers only active holds which are without release details.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Holds.Total Holds Count

presentationColumns.name: Average Days on Hold
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Sum (Release Date - Hold Date) / Total number of holds applied on invoice headers and lines considering active and release holds). The active holds are without release details and use the system date if the release date is not available.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Holds.Average Days on Hold

presentationColumns.name: Invoices on Hold Release Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoice amount and considers all invoice types that have either Header Level Hold, Line Level Hold, or a combination. This metrics considers only active holds that are released.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Holds.Invoices on Hold Release Amount

presentationColumns.name: Invoice Headers on Hold Release Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoice amount and considers all invoice types that have Header Level Hold. This metrics considers active holds that are released.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Holds.Invoice Headers on Hold Release Amount

localization.localizationKey: Invoice Headers on Hold Release Amount

presentationColumns.name: Invoice Lines on Hold Release Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoice line amount which had line level hold and considers all invoice types. This metrics considers active holds that are released.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Holds.Invoice Lines on Hold Release Amount

localization.localizationKey: Invoice Lines on Hold Release Amount

presentationColumns.name: Header Holds Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the header hold count which has header level hold and considers all invoice types. This metrics considers only active holds which are without release details.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Holds.Header Holds Count

presentationColumns.name: Line Holds Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the line hold count which has line level hold and considers all invoice types. This metrics considers only active holds which are without release details.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Holds.Line Holds Count
